article_title: Taxing Carried Interest Capital Gains As Ordinary Income Is A Very Bad Idea

article_metadata.description: Taxing carried interest as ordinary income is a really dumb idea. The title is just being polite. It makes no sense as a matter of tax policy. It makes no sense if your goal is to soak the rich. It makes no sense if you want to raise money for tax [...]
article_metadata.author: Ryan Ellis
